radiographic_examinations.findings: 8 mm subpleural nodular density at the lateral right base unchanged; mild pneumobilia; inflammation abutting the inferior cecum consistent with perforated appendix; fat-containing periumbilical hernia.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Spleen size increased from 10.5 cm on prior CT to 12.0 cm; no changes in 8 mm subpleural nodular density.
